-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Classes for automatic conversion to and from strict and lazy bytestrings.
--   
--   In theory, this allows the design of more data-agnostic APIs.
@package bytestring-class
@version 0.0.0

module Data.ByteString.Class
class StrictByteString a
toStrictByteString :: StrictByteString a => a -> ByteString
fromStrictByteString :: StrictByteString a => ByteString -> a
class LazyByteString a
toLazyByteString :: LazyByteString a => a -> ByteString
fromLazyByteString :: LazyByteString a => ByteString -> a
instance LazyByteString String
instance LazyByteString ByteString
instance LazyByteString ByteString
instance StrictByteString String
instance StrictByteString ByteString
instance StrictByteString ByteString
